name: Mysterious Island
description:
189 Weekly Game Jam: 'Small Island'

Explore the island using the shovel you have, discover how to leave.

W | A | S | D - Move

Space | Use Shovel

Left Click - Punch

ESC | Quit game (Windows only)

Minor adjustments yet needed that I plan to do: Persistent gold, some sprite colors changes, more levels, menu and maybe a small story. Open to feedback and Tips :D.
